content: ahhhh, so that's what tcx.closure_env_ty is used for
I don't know if you can answer this @bjorn3 but do we not need to erase regions in the closure subst, like for functions?
Xavier Denis has marked this topic as resolved.

An Instance already has most lifetimes erased. The rest are erased after calling this function at https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/788b1fe5b79a8b74215022f9df49b0eae68a50b9/compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/layout.rs#L3001
ok yea, I call that function pretty systematically
